vo-dml:model.name: mango
vo-dml:model.description: Data model based oon components and data association for source data
vo-dml:model.title: Mango
vo-dml:model.author: Laurent Michel, Fran??ois Bonnarel, Gilles Landais, Mireille Louys, Marco Molinaro, Jesue Salgado

enumeration.name: ShapeFrame
enumeration.description: Possible options to encode a shape in a string.

enumeration.name: ShapeSerialization
enumeration.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

literal.name: MOC

literal.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

literal.name: POLYGON
literal.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

enumeration.name: CalibrationLevel
enumeration.description: Science ready data with the instrument signature removed (ObsCore).

literal.name: Raw
literal.description: Raw instrumental data, in a proprietary or internal data provider defined format, that needs instrument specific tools to be handled (ObsCore).

literal.name: Instrumental
literal.description: Instrumental data in a standard format which could be manipulated with standard astronomical packages (ObsCore).

literal.name: Calibrated
literal.description: Science ready data with the instrument signature removed (ObsCore).

enumeration.name: ColorDefinition
enumeration.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

literal.name: HardnessRatio
literal.description: Normalized ratio of fluxes: $(F_{EB2} - F_{EB1}) / (F_{EB2} + F_{EB1})$

dataType.name: VocabularyTerm
dataType.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: uri
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: MangoObject
objectType.description: Root class of the model. MANGO instances are meant of be Source instances. A source is something with an identifier and two docks: one for the parameters and one for the associated data.

attribute.name: identifier
attribute.description: Unique identifier for a Source. The uniqueness of that identifier is not managed by the model. The format is free.

composition.name: propertyDock
composition.description: Composition link pointing on all parameters attached to the source.

reference.name: dataOrigin
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: associatedMangoObjects
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: DataLink
objectType.description: Class for associated data referenced by an URL

attribute.name: content_type
attribute.description: Mime type of the URL

attribute.name: access_url
attribute.description: Web endpoint

attribute.name: content_qualifier
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: local_semantics
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: AssociatedMangoObject
objectType.description: Reference to another MANGO instance that is part of the associated data.

attribute.name: semantic
attribute.description: Reference to a semantic concept giving the nature of the associated data. As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the LinkSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the associated data

composition.name: mangoObject
composition.description: Composition link pointing on one MANGO instance associated with the source.

objectType.name: Property
objectType.description: Reference to a particular measure of the Source. This class is used to specify the type of the measure as well as its role.

attribute.name: semantics
attribute.description: Reference to a semantic concept giving the nature of the parameter As long as the vocabulary is not set, the possible values of this attribute are given by the ParamSemantic enumeration.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Free text description of the measure

objectType.name: EpochPosition
objectType.description: Class grouping all parameters needed to define an object position at a given epoch. The space coordinate system is common to all attributes to insure the consistance between all of the instance parameters.

objectType.name: EpochPositionErrors
objectType.description: Class for the error attached to a EpochPosition. The component in this class represent the errors of individual parameters as well as errors due to the parameter correlations.

composition.name: parallax
composition.description: Parallax error. This error is meant to be symetrical.

composition.name: radialVelocity
composition.description: Error in the radial velocity. This error is meant to be symetrical.

dataType.name: PropertyError
dataType.description: Root (abstract) class of the errors that can be attached to a MA?GO property. The class inherit from \texttt{meas:uncertainty} in order to be usable in the context of properties based on \texttt{Measures} classes.

attribute.name: confidenceLevel
attribute.description: Confidence level of the error, expressed in \sigma.

attribute.name: sigma
attribute.description: Error amplitude.

dataType.name: ErrorCovMatrix
dataType.description: Diagonal 2D matrix. Non diagonal elements are null.

attribute.name: variance1
attribute.description: First diagonal element ($(x_11)$)

attribute.name: variance2
attribute.description: Second diagonal element ($(x_22)$)

attribute.name: covariance
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

dataType.name: Ellipse
dataType.description: Elliptical errror for 2D parameters such as the sky positions.

attribute.name: semiMajorAxis
attribute.description: Half of the ellipse major axis.

attribute.name: semiMinorAxis
attribute.description: Half of the ellipse minor axis.

attribute.name: angle
attribute.description: Angle between the North Polar Cape (NCP) and the major axis. This angle must be positive taking into account that angles are positive from North to the East. The angle has its own unit.

dataType.name: PropertyError2D
dataType.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

dataType.name: ErrorCorrMatrix
dataType.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: sigma1
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: sigma2
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: correlation
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

package.name: dataorigin
package.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: DataOrigin
objectType.description: Class representing the origin of the data following the DCP note (TBD)

attribute.name: citation
attribute.description: Dataset idnetifier that can be used for citation (e.g. DOI)

attribute.name: reference_url
attribute.description: Dataset landing page

attribute.name: resource_version
attribute.description: Dataset version

attribute.name: creator
attribute.description: Person(s) mainly involved in the creation of the resource, generally the author.

attribute.name: cites
attribute.description: Identifier (IVOID, DOI or Bibcode) of a second resource using relation of type \texttt{cites} (\url{https://www.ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/relationship_type/})

attribute.name: is_derived_from
attribute.description: Identifier (IVOID, DOI or Bibcode) of a second resource using relation of type \texttt{is_derived_from} (\url{https://www.ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/relationship_type/})

attribute.name: original_date
attribute.description: Date of the original resource from which the MANGO source instance is derived

reference.name: query
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: rights
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: article
reference.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Article
objectType.description: Reference article for the MANGO source

attribute.name: editor
attribute.description: Article editor name

attribute.name: article
attribute.description: Bibcode or DOI of the reference article

objectType.name: QueryOrigin
objectType.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: ivoid
attribute.description: IVOID of the underlying data collection

attribute.name: publisher
attribute.description: Data center that produced the MANGOI source instance

attribute.name: server_software
attribute.description: Version of the software the produced the MANO source instance. It is encouraged to follow \url{https://ivoa.net/documents/Notes/softid/index.html}.

attribute.name: service_protocol
attribute.description: IVOID of the protocol through which the data was retrieved

attribute.name: request
attribute.description: Full request URL including a query string. For the simple protocols,put the url-encoded form of the query parameters. For TAP queries, use the /sync UWS URL. The format is free for others request types.

attribute.name: query
attribute.description: Input query in a formal langage such as ADQL.

attribute.name: request_date
attribute.description: Query execution date

attribute.name: contact
attribute.description: Email or URL to contact the publisher

objectType.name: License
objectType.description: Place holder for the license covering the MANGO instance

attribute.name: rights_uri
attribute.description: Licence URI following the regostry practice. This should come from SPDX \url{https://spdx.org/licenses}. Creatives Commons (\url{https://creativecommons.org}) are also accepted.

attribute.name: rights
attribute.description: License or Copyright text
